card-flavor-28: Good thing they no longer kill humans.
card-flavor-65: Will always come back to aid you.
card-flavor-505: They shall seek vengence upon thos who deemed them unworthy.
card-flavor-506: You should find a way to get rid of this as silently as possible.
card-flavor-553: It's glad it could be of service.
card-flavor-358: "I am the God of this world!"
card-flavor-203: This guy's transformation animation is probably one of the funniest things I've seen.
